title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Improving Biology Textbooks: Customized Materials for Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts of cell structure and energy metabolism using customized biology textbooks.
Learners can analyze practical case studies in textbooks to derive at least three connections between their professional field and biological knowledge.

Using digital annotation tools (Hypothes.is, Notion, etc.), learners reorganize at least ten core AI textbook concepts, incorporate three or more peer feedback sessions, and complete a learning portfolio by the end of the six-month course that meets the evaluation rubric standards (80% content accuracy, 70% creativity).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
